title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.15 - Discharge of sewage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.15 - Discharge of sewage

State Regulations

There shall be no discharge of sewage or wastes into the
reservoir without a written permit from the Department of Environmental

Conservation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
606.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
